characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Add 1 to all hit rolls made for PLAGUEBEARER units within 6" of one or more friendly models with this ability. In addition, if you make a hit roll of 7+ for a PLAGUEBEARER unit within 6" off one or more friendly models with this ability, you can immediately make one additional attack at the same target with the same weapon (these bonus attacks cannot themselves generate any further attacks).
